未調査領域――新ルートの探索から無事帰還して、しばらく経った。: It had been a while since we'd safely returned from exploring the unexplored territory—the new route.
……頭痛、めまい、ナシ。ようやっと本調子ってところか。: ...No headaches, no dizziness. Looks like she's finally back to normal.
メイズシンドローム……今後も気をつけていかないとな。: Maze Syndrome... I'll have to be more careful from now on.
本当ですよ……もうどれだけ心配したと思ってるんですか……！\n: It's true... Do you have any idea how worried I was?!
あ、いたのか。\nいや、ピコまったく出てこなかったし。:
Oh, there she is.
No, Pico didn't come out at all.
ボクが裏でどれだけ機体制御を助けたと思ってるんですか！\nおよよ、マスターはぜん:
How much do you think I helped you control the aircraft behind the scenes?!
Oh, Master, you didn't understand at all...
そうなのか？ 例えば何してくれてたんだ？: Is that so? For example, what were you doing for me?
見えてなかったんですか！？\n頑張れーってモニターに表示したり！:
Didn't you see it?!
You can see it on the monitor telling you to do your best!
……ごめん、それはまったく気づかないし、\n気づいたら気が散るやつだ。:
...Sorry, I didn't notice that at all,
He's the kind of guy who gets distracted before he realizes it.
けど、これで俺のメイズ適性も大きく向上した。\n次はいつもより深いところまで探索:
But this greatly improved my mace aptitude.
It looks like we'll be able to explore deeper than usual next time.
チームの資金問題もまだ完全解決したわけじゃない。\n可能な限り探索頻度を上げてい:
The team's financial problems hadn't been completely resolved yet.
I'd like to increase our search frequency as much as possible.
他のみんなも体調が完全回復した頃だろうし……\nそろそろメイズ探索を再開するか！:
Everyone else is probably feeling better by now...
Let's get back to searching for Mayse!
おはよう、みんな！\n今日は絶好のメイズ日和だな！:
Good morning, everyone!
Today's the perfect day for a mace!
白奈、どんな寝言だよ……: Shirona, what are you talking about in your sleep...?
……あれ？ なんだか元気がないな。\nここ数日は訓練も無しで休みに専念してたはず:
...Huh? You look kinda down.
For the past few days, I've been focusing on my days off without any training.
おはよう、みんなッッッ！！！\nいい天気だネッ！！ 絶好のメイズ日和だナッッッッ:
Good morning, everyone!!!
The weather's so nice!! Perfect weather for a maaaaaz!!!!
うるさ……頭ガンガンするから、大きい声出すなぁ……！！: Shut up... My head's pounding, so don't shout...!!
すみません……聞こえておりましたけれど、返事をする気力が……: I'm sorry... I heard you, but I don't have the energy to answer...
だからどんな寝言だよ……: So what are you talking about in your sleep...?
あはは……みんなまだ、疲れが残ってるみたいで……: Ahaha... Looks like everyone's still tired...
なんだ、だらしないな。俺はもう、この通りピンピンしてるぞ。: What's with the sloppy attitude? I'm perfectly fine, as you can see.
誰がバカだ。バカと言うほうが、バカなんだぞ。: Who are you calling stupid? It's stupider to call me stupid.
いつもならラミがもう一度噛みついてくるはずだが、\nそんな元気もないのか受け流さ:
Normally, Rami would bite me again, but...
She brushed me off, as if she didn't have the energy to do so. It was a little sad.
だが、無理もないか。この前の地下探索は\n一歩間違えれば命を落とす危険があった。:
But I guess that's understandable. The last time we went underground
One wrong move and I was in danger of losing my life.
肉体以上に、精神的疲労が大きいのだろう。\nあと数日は休ませてやった方がいいのか:
She must be even more mentally exhausted than her body.
Maybe I should let her rest for a few more days...
……と思ったが、ちゆる。おまえは元気そうだな。\nさっきから何をやってるんだ？:
...Or so I thought, but Chiyuru. You seem to be doing well.
What have you been doing this whole time?
そう聞かれると、つい否定したくなる。: Hearing her say that makes me want to deny it.
えーっ！ そんなに気になる！？ 実はこの間の新ルート経験で、\n素晴らしいインス:
Whaaat?! You're that curious?! Actually, from my new route experience the other day,
I got some great inspiration!
あれ？ 『いや、別に』って答えなかったっけ？: Huh? Didn't she say "no, not really"?
これまで利用方法のわからなかったＴ２元素なんだけど、\n先進的かつ革命的な利用方:
It's a T2 element I didn't know how to use until now, but...
I've come up with an advanced and revolutionary way to use it!
それにはまずＴ２元素の持つ、\n抗重力作用の説明から始めないといけないんだけど─:
First of all, the T2 element.
I have to start with an explanation of the antigravity effect.
『Ｔ２元素』。別名『タツミヤ・ツー』。\nタツミヤ鉱から人類が単離に成功した元素:
T2 Element. Also known as Tatsumiya Two.
It's one of the elements that humans have successfully isolated from Tatsumiya Ore: the T element.
（って、める達に聞かされたな）: (Wait, Meguru and the others told me.)
そもそも人類がタツミヤ鉱を手に入れんとするのは、\nこれらタツミヤ鉱に含まれるＴ:
In the first place, the reason humanity is trying to obtain Tatsumiya Ore is because...
This is because I want the T element contained in these Tatsumiya Ore.
ただ今のところ、タツミヤ・ワンであるＴ１元素と、\nタツミヤ・ツーであるＴ２元素:
It's just that at the moment, we're dealing with Tatsumiya One's T1 element
Only two types of T2 elements—Tatsumiya Two—had been successfully isolated
他にも人類にとって未知の元素が含まれているとされているが、\nいわゆる『タツミヤ:
It is said to contain other elements unknown to humanity, but...
After the so-called "Tatsumiya Three," it was still out of humanity's hands.
ちょっ！ 近い近い近い！\n聞く！ 話聞いてやるから、ちょっと離れろ！:
Hey! You're so close, so close!
Listen! I'll listen to you, so get away from me!
油断すると唇がぶつかり合う距離で話すもんだから、\nこっちだって気が気じゃない。:
If we let our guards down, we'll talk at a distance where our lips meet, so...
I don't feel like it either.
つか、なんか全体的に犬小屋みたいなニオイするぞ、お前！\n風呂入ってんのか！？:
Actually, you smell like a doghouse all over!
Are you taking a bath?!
Ｔ２元素の反応は不規則、不安定というのが今までの学説ね！\nつまり抗重力作用は認:
The theory up until now has been that T2 elemental reactions are irregular and unstable!
In other words, even though it acknowledges the anti-gravity effect, it's still considered difficult to divert the technology!
こっちの話まったく聞いてねぇ！: He didn't listen to a word I said!
それがね！ その考えがそもそも間違いだったの！: That's it! That was a mistake in the first place!
（あ、これ、別にコミュニケーションは求められてないやつだ……）: (Ah, this isn't the kind of thing that needs to be communicated...)
逆転の発想でＴ２元素の重力波を制御するのではなく、\n重力の伝播媒体の方に手を加:
She didn't use the idea of turning things around to control the T2 elemental gravitational waves
I should have modified the gravity transfer medium!
伝播媒体、つまりは──空間そのものよ！\nその位相を書き換えることで──:
It's a medium for transmission. In other words, space itself!
By rewriting that phase...
メイズオタクモードになったら、もう誰も止めらんないね。\nほんと何言ってんのか、:
Once you're in maise otaku mode, no one will be able to stop you.
Seriously, I have no idea what she's saying.
帰還してからあまり寝てないようですし、\n少しハイになってしまっているのもあるか:
You haven't slept much since you got home,
I may have gotten a little high.
ちゆるさん、時々こうなっちゃうんですよね。: Chiyuru-san can be like this sometimes.
確か会員が自分だけのメイズ研究同好会を主宰してるんだっけ？: If I'm not mistaken, the members preside over their own maise research society, right?
何も成果出したことないみたいだけどねー。: It doesn't look like he's achieved anything, though.
完全に趣味でやっているだけと、以前本人が言ってました。: He told me before that he's just doing it as a hobby.
まあ、Ｔ２元素の利用方法なんて、\n本当だったらザルトゥーム島全土が震撼しますわ:
Well, as for how to use the T2 element...
If it's true, the entire island of Zarthum will tremble.
２徹目以降のちゆるの話は聞かなくていい。: You don't have to listen to me after the second round.
おはよう。とってもぐっすり。: Good morning. You're very sound asleep.
前に、メイズシフターの観察日記をつけてた時もこんな感じだった。: She'd been like this the last time she'd kept an observation diary on the Maizsifter.
観察日記……？ 何をやってるんだか……: An observation diary...? I don't know what they're doing...
探せばデータが残ってるかも。……あった。: If I look for it, I might find some data. ...There it is.
言いながら、白奈がデータを送ってきた。: As she spoke, Shirona sent me the data.
メイズシフターの観察日記……\nちょっと面白そうなのが嫌だ。:
The Maizsifter's observation diary...
I don't like it when it sounds a little interesting.
そこには、あらゆるメイズシフターの行動の記録と、\nそこから導き出される有効な戦:
There was a record of every maise shifter's actions
An effective tactic derived from that, and...
研究と分析、そして考察。思っていた以上に詳しく、\n各形態ごとの情報がまとめられ:
Research, analysis, and consideration. More detailed than I expected.
It contained information on each form.
ただの日記と切り捨てるには、惜しい代物かもしれないぞ、\nこいつは……:
It might be a shame to cut it off as just a diary,
This is...
……そうなの？ 長すぎて最初の３行で読むのやめちゃった。: ...Really? It was so long that I stopped reading in the first three lines.
だって、メイズオタクのちゆるが書いたんだよ？\n絶対変な内容だと思うじゃん。:
I mean, it was written by Chiyuru, a maise otaku, you know?
I think it's definitely weird.
これを読む限り、ちゆるの研究は趣味というには謎に専門性が高い。\n各理論もこじつ:
As far as I can tell from reading this, Chiyuru's research is mysteriously specialized for hobbies.
There weren't many theories that seemed to be too complicated, so there was a big sense of understanding.
でね、ここで活きるのがＴ２元素の位相転移時に起きる……\nって、ちゃんと聞いてる:
And the only thing that comes to life here is the phase transition of the T2 element...
Wait, are you listening to me?!
みんな疲れてるみたいだし、また別の機会に聞くよ。\nちゆるも研究は一旦区切ってゆ:
Everyone seems tired, so I'll ask you another time.
Chiyuru, stop your research and get some rest.
なんでよ！？ こっからが面白いのに！: Why?! This is the fun part!
お前の体調が心配なんだよ。\nここ数日、ずっと研究してるんだろ？:
I'm worried about your health.
You've been doing research for the past few days, haven't you?
それと、風呂にはちゃんと入れ。\nうら若き乙女がしちゃいけない臭いがするぞ。:
Also, make sure to take a bath.
It smells like something a young maiden shouldn't do.
え、うそ……あたし、そんなに臭う……？: Huh? No way... Am I really that smelly...?
こちらを一瞥するなり、一瞬頬を赤く染めた。: As soon as she glanced at me, her cheeks flushed red for a moment.
お前の研究は面白いな。もう少し詳しく話してくれないか？: Your research is interesting. Could you tell me more about it?
ええ、もちろんよ！\n１から１０まで全部教えてあげるわ！:
Yes, of course!
I'll teach you everything from one to ten!
げぇ！ おまえ、マジかよ？\nひと晩付き合わされても知んないよ？:
Geh! Are you serious?
I don't care if you're forced to spend the night with me.
こんなに楽しそうなちゆる、初めてだからな。\n誰かが付き合ってやらなきゃ可哀想だ:
This is the first time I've ever had this much fun.
I'd feel bad if someone didn't go along with it.
あっそ。じゃあラミ達は帰るから。: Oh, I see. Well then, Rami and the others are going home.
それじゃあね、そもそも重力を量子化する理論から！\nこれには複数の理論があるんだ:
Well then, let's start with the theory of quantifying gravity in the first place!
There are multiple theories about this, but...!
%usernameusernameuserna%さんと七彩さんに、\n生徒会長か:
%usernameusernameuserna%-san and Nanaya-san,
From the student council president...?
みたいだな。\n今すぐ生徒会室に来いって……随分と強引だな。:
Looks like it.
She wants me to come to the student council room right now... That's pretty pushy.
それだけ急ぎのお話なんでしょう。: That's how urgent the story is.
てなわけで、悪いな。俺達は生徒会室に行ってくる。: Anyway, sorry about that. We're going to the student council room.
ちょっと！ まだ全然話し足りないんだけど！: Hey! We haven't talked enough yet!
代わりにラミ達が聞いてくれるってさ。: Rami and the others will listen to you instead.
はぁ！？ ラミ達に押し付けるつもりかよ！ ふざけんな！: Huh?! Are you trying to push this on Rami and the others?! Don't be ridiculous!
それじゃ頼んだからな！: Well then, I'm counting on you!
